kpa.model

Class KSpec

  • java.lang.Object
    • kpa.model.KSpec

  • public class KSpec
extends java.lang.Object
    Specification for a Kakuro combination, consisting of a sum and a length (immutable).
    Invariant:
    NonNegative: 0 <= getSum() && 0 <= getLength()

    • Field Summary
